title: Drawing, "Design for Wall Hanging "Jubilee"", 1950–76
medium: Graphite, brush and red gouache on heavy, textured white paper laminated to cardboard
inscribed:
Recto:  inscribed in graphite along lower edge:  sketch wall hanging.:  jubilee [last three letters unclear]; along left edge:  measured off every six and twelve lines; verso:  in graphite:  linen        2.25 +  [?]
               reed        2.-
               beach      1.85
               grey (sic) 1.25
               yellow      1.-
           _______________
                             
              wallhanging.  50.-
              tapestry        85.-
           _______________
 
               gray (sic) cloth. 15.-ay.
               pillow                 4.-
               pillow cover        3.-
provenance: Eric Elsesser, California; 1993: acquired by Museum
creditline: Gift of Mr. Eric and Mrs. Sylvia Elsesser, The Trude Guermonprez Archives
description: Sketch of weaving pattern with vertical and horizontal lines.  Numbers along left edge of drawing.

tombstone.epitaph: Drawing, "Design for Wall Hanging "Jubilee"", 1950–76. Graphite, brush and red gouache on heavy, textured white paper laminated to cardboard. Gift of Mr. Eric and Mrs. Sylvia Elsesser, The Trude Guermonprez Archives. 1993-121-88.
